articles.title: Kotak Securities downgrades rating on Canara and PNB, chooses SBI over them; read to know why? - The Financial Express
articles.description: The brokerage house said that it sees the banking sector as attractive. The rational brokerage gave was that the banks’ profitability has increased due to lower provisions and higher revenue recovery from bad loan resolutions.
